column6: - Finishing her business with Yukio in Las Vegas, Storm hitches a flight home. - But unbeknownst to her, she's got some stowaways in her carry-on luggage: vengeful assassins armed to the teeth! - And they intend to make sure Storm doesn't reach her destination...
column8: | penciller:Al Barrionuevo | penciller (cover):Stephanie Hans | editor:Daniel Ketchum | writer:Greg Pak
